title: Shamanic Full Moon Meditation Release Renew
description: Stephanie will lead a shamanic full moon release ceremony with meditation and energy healing.
cleaned_text: | | Monday, 8/3/20 @ 7PM EST via Zoom Join Stephanie to connect, reset your energy body, and energize your intentions for JOY, PEACE, LOVE She will lead a shamanic full moon release ceremony with meditation and chakra energy healing. We will release heavy/negative/dark energy and create space for light/positive/clear energy to thrive. Come away relaxed and renewed. RSVP Required.
